Hi, I'm Kim....

a mom of two and a self-taught web developer. I have been fascinated by web development for years. So, during the pandemic while everything was shut down and we were all stuck inside, I decided to throw myself into finally learning how to code. So far, I know HTML & CSS and I'm in the process of learning javascript. Ultimately, my hope is to find employment as a front-end web developer.
